Package modele.traitement

Class Graphe

java.lang.Object
modele.traitement.Graphe
public class Graphe extends Object
Class generating a graph from a list of observations

      Do a DFS of the graph
      Parameters:
      som1 - the vertex to start with
      som2 - ethe vertex to finish with
      parcouru - the vertex who ave already been checked
      stack - the other vertex to check
      Returns:
      true if it arrive to the vertex arrive, or else false

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • excentricite

      public int excentricite(int idSom)
      Returns the maximal number of sides of the path from the given vertex and the others vertices. If the graph is not connected, returns -1.
      Parameters:
      idSom - the vertex's id
      Returns:
      the maximal number of edges of the path betweeen the vertex in parameter and the other vertex in the graph
